title: Discogs users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

tosdr.case: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
tosdr.tldr:
Discogs' ToS state: "You shall not interfere with another personâ€™s use and enjoyment of the Service or another entity's use and enjoyment of similar services."
This statement is kept very vague and could potentially be used as grounds for censorship or account deletion.
